meanings.definition: A short break between academic terms.
meanings.sent1: During the interterm, students relax and recharge for the upcoming term.
meanings.sent2: The interterm allows students to take a breather before diving into the next term.
meanings.sent3: The interterm felt like a mini-vacation from all the schoolwork.
meanings.sent4: The interterm was a brief oasis of free time in the midst of a busy academic year.
meanings.sent5: I always look forward to the interterm as a chance to unwind and destress.
